mosinstall.name: VirtueMart TopTen products Module
mosinstall.author: soeren
mosinstall.description: Shows the best selling products from your VirtueMart.

param.name: num_topsellers
param.label: Number of displayed products
param.description: This defines the number of products which will be displayed in the module.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
